DOC.brief_summary: This study test palatability several different CP-690,550 oral preparation train product tester healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Taste Of Different Oral Liquid Preparations Of CP-690,550 In Trained Adult Product Testers
DOC.detailed_description: To develop palatable pediatric oral solution dosage form CP-690,550 .
DOC.criteria: Trained healthy nonpregnant product tester , age 1875 Severe acute chronic medical condition , include hepatitis tuberculosis infection clinically significant laboratory abnormality .
DOC.keyword: taste study open label investigational drug oral therapy
